I did an online order; however, I'm very disappointed with what I received. I ordered the peri peri chicken legs. I got the tiniest pieces of chicken legs I have ever seen. I ordered a platter with rice, fries, and two chicken breasts, and got two very, very small breasts, or they could be chicken thighs. What's disappointing is that this order couldn't even be shared with two people; that's how small the portion was. I was extremely excited to try this place. The food does have flavors, but the portion is a no-go.

Amazing food and service! The Peri Peri chicken is juicy, flavorful, and grilled to perfection. The spice levels are just right, you can choose from lemon & herb to NAGA depending on your taste. Their wings, burgers, and platters are all delicious, and everything tastes fresh. The staff is friendly and the place is super clean. Definitely one of the best spots in Queens for halal grilled food. Highly recommend!
A perfect combination of amazing ambiance, exceptional food and top-notch, will definitely return

‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê‚≠ê A Flavor-Packed Gem with Heart ‚ù§Ô∏è

I discovered 786 Peri Peri Grill recently and it instantly won me over. From the moment I stepped in, the atmosphere was inviting‚Äîand the aromas of rich, spicy peri-peri coated everything in warmth.

I tried their Honey Garlic Lemon Pepper Wings, the Grilled Chicken Platter, and the signature Peri Peri Burger‚Äîeach dish was vibrant, flavorful, and made with care. The chicken, marinated just right, had that perfect blend of spice and juiciness, and the variety on the menu (wings, platters, wraps, burgers, and more) kept every bite exciting
